mutants.original_line: s = ''.join(c if c.isalpha() else ' ' for c in s)
mutants.mutated_line: s = 'MUTATED'.join((c if c.isalpha() else ' ' for c in s))

mutants.original_line: s = ''.join(c if c.isalpha() else ' ' for c in s)
mutants.mutated_line: s = ''.join((c if c.isalpha() else '' for c in s))
